name: Vegan Lemon Cupcakes
recipeIngredient: 125ml non dairy milk, 1 tsp apple cider vinegar, 60ml olive oil, 100g caster sugar, 96g gluten free self raising flour, 1 tsp baking powder, 50g oat flour, 1 zest from lemon, 120g icing sugar, 112g vegan stick butter, 1/4 tsp blue spirulina, 1/2 tsp pink pitaya powder
